entries.name: Apples
entries.text: A common, sweet, crunchy fruit, usually green or yellow in color.

entries.name: Pears
entries.text: A fairly common, sweet, usually green fruit, usually softer than Apples.

entries.name: Bananas
entries.text: A long, curved, yellow fruit, with a fairly gentle flavor.

entries.name: Oranges
entries.text: Orange in color, usually sweet but can be sharp, often contains pips.

entries.name: Peaches
entries.text: An orange fruit with big stone in the middle, and sweet, juicy flesh.

entries.name: Strawberries
entries.text: A red fruit with yellow seeds on the outside; has a sweet flavor and a pretty shape.

entries.name: Blueberries
entries.text: They are berries and they are blue; sweet in flavor, small in size, round.
